imdb.plot outline: Long time ago, there was a place called Shenyu in the universe. It was a beautiful place with a lot of great views. The Gods there were protecting the universe away the darkness. But once, Shenyu suffered heavy losses during the fight with the the evil. With the guide of Shang Xuan, Zhong Tian, The King of Blaze came to the man's world to find the key to save his home. Out there, He met Situ Fengjian who looked exactly the same with his lover Qian Mei who wasn't confirmed to be dead or alive. He was about to experience a legend which lasted for three lifetimes.
imdb.title: The King of Blaze
plot: It tells a story about Zhong Tian, _The King of Blaze_ (qv) of Shenyu who came to the man's world to save his home.::Ge Yang

Long time ago, there was a place called Shenyu in the universe. It was a beautiful place with a lot of great views. The Gods there were protecting the universe away the darkness. But once, Shenyu suffered heavy losses during the fight with the the evil. With the guide of Shang Xuan, Zhong Tian, _The King of Blaze_ (qv) came to the man's world to find the key to save his home. Out there, He met Situ Fengjian who looked exactly the same with his lover Qian Mei who wasn't confirmed to be dead or alive. He was about to experience a legend which lasted for three lifetimes.::Yang Ge
